name: Vanilla Bliss
description: Our signature vanilla candle offers a warm, comforting scent that transforms any space into a cozy sanctuary. Made with premium soy wax and infused with pure vanilla essential oils for a rich, authentic fragrance.
fragrance: Pure Vanilla, Warm Amber, Subtle Caramel
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils

name: Midnight Lavender
description: Unwind with the calming scent of lavender fields at dusk. This elegant candle combines French lavender with subtle notes of bergamot and cedarwood for a soothing experience that promotes relaxation and tranquility.
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils

name: Citrus Grove
description: Brighten your space with the refreshing scent of sun-ripened citrus. This invigorating blend of orange, lemon, and grapefruit creates an uplifting atmosphere that energizes and refreshes.
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils

name: Amber & Oud
description: A sophisticated blend of rich amber and exotic oud wood creates a luxurious, warm atmosphere. Complemented by subtle notes of sandalwood and musk for a contemporary scent that's both mysterious and inviting.
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Natural Fragrance

name: Urban Concrete
description: Inspired by the energy of city life, this unique candle combines mineral notes with hints of vetiver and violet leaf. The sleek concrete vessel adds an industrial chic touch to any modern interior.
fragrance: Mineral Notes, Vetiver, Violet Leaf, Light Musk
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Concrete Vessel

name: Black Fig & Vetiver
description: A contemporary blend of ripe black fig and earthy vetiver creates a sophisticated and complex fragrance. Notes of dark berries and warm spices add depth to this modern scent experience.
fragrance: Black Fig, Vetiver, Dark Berries, Warm Spices
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Natural Fragrance

name: Artisan Cedarwood
description: Hand-poured in small batches, this artisanal candle features the rich, woody scent of aged cedarwood. Each unique vessel is hand-thrown by local potters, making every candle a one-of-a-kind piece of functional art.
fragrance: Aged Cedarwood, Pine Needle, Light Smoke
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Handcrafted Ceramic Vessel

name: Wildflower Meadow
description: Capturing the essence of a summer meadow in full bloom, this artisanal candle is infused with a blend of wildflowers and herbs. Each candle is topped with dried flowers, creating a beautiful display even when not lit.
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Dried Flowers

name: Bourbon & Oak
description: Aged bourbon and charred oak combine in this sophisticated artisanal candle. Hand-poured into reclaimed whiskey glasses, each candle carries subtle notes of vanilla and caramel for a truly unique sensory experience.
fragrance: Aged Bourbon, Charred Oak, Vanilla, Caramel
ingredients: Premium Soy Wax, Cotton Wick, Pure Essential Oils, Reclaimed Whiskey Glass
